On one block of West College Avenue students will find a candy store and two bakeries PERIOD And now two more businesses want their shot at sweet success PERIOD

Sweet Tooth Bakery a businesses new to State College is under construction at  Calder Way next to the rear of Paul  Tonys Stereo PERIOD

Sweet Tooth Bakery owner Cheri Christian said she chose downtown State College for her bakery because it is in an easily accessible location PERIOD Although West College Avenue has two other bakeries Christian said she doent expect any competition between her business and The Bakery  W PERIOD College Ave. and Ye Old College Diner  Bakery  W PERIOD College Ave PERIOD

 Christian said PERIOD

Among the items that will be available at Sweet Tooth Bakery in October are novelty and wedding cakes cheesecakes chocolate business cards and all types of cookie creations PERIOD Christian said they hope to try selling funnel cakes on Fridays PERIOD

Instead of coffee Christian said she will sell gourmet cocoa PERIOD

 she said PERIOD

Steven Korkus coowner of The Bakery doesnt fear competition after  years in business PERIOD Along with the usual bakery items Korkus designs specialty cakes PERIOD

But to Korkus having three bakeries on one block doesnt make sense PERIOD

 he said PERIOD

Dan Pivirotto owner of Ye Old College Diner  Bakery thinks the competition will be good for business PERIOD

 he said PERIOD

The Diner has been in business  years but only entered the bakery business in  PERIOD

Bakery delights arent the only glucosefilled items you can sample on West College Avenue PERIOD

Gardners Candies opened its twenty-third store at  W PERIOD College Ave. formerly the location of Candy Express PERIOD The official opening of the store was celebrated with a ribboncutting ceremony yesterday PERIOD

Gardners Candies is most famous for Peanut Butter Meltaway candy bars said Donna Crozier the stores comanager but the store will also sell other types of chocolate confections cooked nuts and ice cream and it features a pennycandy case PERIOD

The Candy Cane a gourmet candy store is just numbers away at  W PERIOD College Ave. but owner Deborah Mastromatteo is not concerned about any loss of business PERIOD

 she said adding her store is quite different from Gardners Candies because her chocolate is all handmade PERIOD

 she said PERIOD

Likewise Crozier said The Candy Cane will not hurt business at Gardners Candies PERIOD

 she said adding this is Gardners ninety-sixth year in business PERIOD
